channel.title: Up to date web clients
channel.description:
Okay, after working extremly hard and researching a few minor edits I have finished a small secret project of mine, dispite being bored to hell and back due to recent events in my area: (http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/wales/8335279.stm) I have finally shifted to create my little own webclient service that I doubt will get any use.
So yeah, gas mains have exploded, I was stuck in my town center intill 1:30am as trains where shut and I'm freezing cold in my house as there is no heating yet.
Here's a little introduction of my work and what I have to offer to you.
[b]Introduction[/b] [i]As of yet I have not listed all the Item, object and NPC Id's, although they contain every up to date model, anim and gfx. [/i]
[ul][li]Animations up to date.[/li] [li]Graphics up to date.[/li] [li]NPC's up to date.[/li] [li]Objects up to date.[/li] [li]Items up to date.[/li] [li]Preloading models (Custom made, fixing bugs and glitches shortly)[/li] [li]Renamed[/li][/ul]
I have added most of the features people are looking for these days, as I am not great at graphics I am still waiting for a experianced person to do so.
The project name also comes under my server development: iSoft.
This thread will be updated shortly, I am just trying to warm my fingers up.

item.title: Up to date web clients
item.dc:creator: @wales_00 wales 00
item.description:
@wales_00 wrote:

CoonHunter:

Alright so its up-2-date. Why should we care? Im sorry, but you didnt really explain anything abut this client to make it appeal to me.

I hope you realize it’s 4*C in my house at the moment.

Read full topic

item.title: Up to date web clients
item.dc:creator: @wales_00 wales 00
item.description:
@wales_00 wrote:

Okay, after working extremly hard and researching a few minor edits I have finished a small secret project of mine, dispite being bored to hell and back due to recent events in my area: (http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/wales/8335279.stm) I have finally shifted to create my little own webclient service that I doubt will get any use.

So yeah, gas mains have exploded, I was stuck in my town center intill 1:30am as trains where shut and I’m freezing cold in my house as there is no heating yet.

Here’s a little introduction of my work and what I have to offer to you.

Introduction
As of yet I have not listed all the Item, object and NPC Id’s, although they contain every up to date model, anim and gfx.

[ul][li]Animations up to date.[/li]
[li]Graphics up to date.[/li]
[li]NPC’s up to date.[/li]
[li]Objects up to date.[/li]
[li]Items up to date.[/li]
[li]Preloading models (Custom made, fixing bugs and glitches shortly)[/li]
[li]Renamed[/li][/ul]

I have added most of the features people are looking for these days, as I am not great at graphics I am still waiting for a experianced person to do so.

The project name also comes under my server development: iSoft.

This thread will be updated shortly, I am just trying to warm my fingers up.
